name: Onohi
description:
Done over the course of the month of June 2017 for Dream Diary Jam.

Only 1 world, 1 subworld, 1 effect, and 1 event.
Will probably be worked on more in the future.

[Z] - interact
[X]- open menu/cancel
Arrow Keys- move

Go to bed to dream. Go to notebook to save. Go to skills to wake up.
